name: Sea's Sister Prologue Demo Level
description:
Sea's Sister is a story based, exploration game that utilizes environmental puzzles and simple gameplay mechanics. The player takes control of a newly created mermaid named Dulce, and with the help of a strange but kindly sea monster named only as the Deep Mother, Dulce aims to find her way to the city of the mer. 

This is only a demo of the prologue level, created in Unreal Engine 4. I worked solo on this project as my capstone for my BA in Interactive Media & Game Design. All art assets, level design, programming, etc. are all either directly my creation, or in the case of sound bytes, are royalty free for a student, not-for-profit project.
